comments:
I see this thrown to the console when editing bean files for newly created annotated EJBs.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.validation 4 0 2006-08-28 14:55:09.465
!MESSAGE

leanup(AbstractEJBValidator.java:306)

Created an attachment (id=48992)
Fix patch

Fix the null pointer issue by creating a helper function to return _validated in AbstractEJBValidator

This patch also 

a. Removes call to validator.cleanup(reporter) from ValidatorLauncher, since cleanup(reporter) is already being called from ValidationOperation(line 1399)

b. Fixes ValidationBuilder by passing the true in the call to EnabledIncrementalValidatorsOperation, this flag is set to  run the validator in job, otherwise the validator run in the build thread.
The fixes seem fine but I thought the validators were already running as part of a job.  Was this a regression?
Yes, this was a regression in case of incremental build.
